oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mountain View Nursery program - 1948-12-23 - 5:30 am show [date unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program sponsored by Mountain View Nursery, starring Wally Fowler with the Georgia Clodhoppers and the Oak Ridge Quartet. Likely originally broadcast December 23, 1948 (unconfirmed, based on it being apparent this show aired the day before the presumed December 24, 1948 show [see TR001467_2 ]) at 5:30 am. Personnel include Ernie Keller (announcer), and performers Wally Fowler, Floyd Ethridge, and Johnny New.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wally Fowler; Georgia Clodhoppers; Oak Ridge Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Ernie Keller) -- Opening statement (Wally Fowler) -- Turn Your Radio On -- Wally Fowler introduces Ernie Keller -- Mountain View Nursery commercial (Ernie Keller) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Floyd Ethridge fiddle) -- I's In His Care -- Wally Fowler introduces Johnny New -- Hello There (Johnny New vocals) -- Wally Fowler introduces Ernie Keller -- Mountain View Nursery commercial (Ernie Keller) -- Wally Fowler talks -- Born In Bethlehem -- Closing statement (Wally Fowler) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Ernie Keller)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Keller, Ernie; Fowler, Wally; Georgia Clodhoppers (Musical group); Oak Ridge Quartet; Ethridge, Floyd, 1908-1981; New, Johnny
